column2: Despite my age, the Federation graciously made me an Architect.
The folks who speak ill of them have got it all wrong.
Don’t worry. I’m positive that the Federation will do something about those monsters soon.
I just know they won’t let anything happen to us.
We haven’t had any contact from the Federation for quite some time now. I wonder what could have happened to them.
Ah well, even if I can’t be an Architect anymore, I still plan to live my life as I see fit.
It’s nice to live in comfort and safety, but, having freedom of choice is important as well.
